body.p: Realization of the XSL-FO formatting dictionary in TeX. First results are expected in the end of summer.
TeXML is an XML vocabulary for TeX. A processor translates TeXML source into TeX.

Note. It is realized that TeX layout model and XSL-FO box layout model are very different. In order to realize XSL-FO in TeX, a new approach should be invented. The project is frozen till real ideas appear.
